title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Lot 1: 2016 Microsoul 0.1BTC DIY plated bearer barLot 2: 2016 Microsoul 0.1BTC DIY plated bearer bar*both bars come with 2x official 2016 Microsoul hologramsLot 3: 2016 BTCC 25k bits green chip, redeemed/blankLot 4: 2015 Shibanu DIY*comes with 2x official Shibanu gold DIY hologramsLot 5: 7x Satori chips, redeemed/blank*This lot will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-chip/coin lot auctionsSTARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN/CHIP: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN/CHIP: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 28nd, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: One millisecond of silence for all these pretty chips that had to die.Lot 2: 0.0002Lot 3: 0.0002
